item.description:
Hello - I thought it would be fun to do a bar crawl. (And full disclosure.... Oct 1 is my birthday, so I wanted to go out!) I had a great time last year when we did one, so I hope this will be just as successful. I'm starting it earlier this year so that people who work in new haven, but don't live here, have an opportunity to come by after work. Come on over!

Here's what I'm thinking:

5:30pm - Kumo

6:30pmish - Olde School

7:45pmish- Downtown at the Taft
UPDATE: $3 Drafts (choice of 12!) and $3 well drinks :D

????

There are no formal dinner plans, but I'm sure we'll eat along the way.

My number will be in my RSVP. I left the 8pm+ blank because I don't know what we'll want to do. Give me a ring if you want to know where we are : )

Hope to see you there!! If anyone else has something they want to go out and celebrate, let me know and I'll post it : )
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the bar area.
item.name: **NHC does (Weekend!) New Haven Nightlife**
